description: The convalescent serum is a treatment that has been used in the treatment of other diseases like SARS. WHO (World Health Organization) has been promoting the convalescent serum as a valid treatment for ebola for a while. It has been used successfully with other ebola cases in the past. The convalescent serum is a treatment that uses blood from patients who have contracted ebola and survived. An ethics committee in WHO has approved uses of unapproved methods of treatment due to the severity of the outbreak. The convalescent serum and many other treatments allow us to try many different options that help speed up the process of finding a treatment that would deal with the disease properly.
summary: The convalescents serum would be used to treat currently afflicted patients dealing with Ebola.
title: Convalescents Serum and Ebola
